Posts.Content: Nov 26, 2013 11:21PM Gina925 wrote: 2 years? omg........I stopped chemo at mid/end of Jun followed by radiation until mid August. The hair is coming back in and its about 2 inches...maybe. It looks a little thin in 2 spots but its growing. I am not comfortable going out in public with this teddy bear looking hair do & especially NOT to the office. It took it a lil time to start up again & grow, hope it picks up some speed. I don't want to have a dude hairdo! Thoughts?
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53

Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2013 08:20PM Gina925 wrote: Im also from the Feb chemo group and have 2 infusions to go. Ive been told that they want you to wait a few weeks before they start radiation to give theÂ chemo meds a chance to get out of your system. From a few that I know who have had it, they told me that its alot easier to deal with then chemo was plus your hair will start to grow back! YESSSSSSS! Gina
